titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 285: Collection of works on astronomy and astronomical instruments

notesStmt.note: Collective title supplied by cataloger; titles for individual works from caption titles, except for work 3, which was supplied by cataloger.
Three loose leaves belonging to this manuscript were formerly inserted in MS Or 278, and have been returned to this volume.
The copyist for most of the works in this collection consistently spells asṭurlāb with an extra tāʼ before the ṭāʼ.

msContents.summary: Collection of works on astronomy and astronomical instruments in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish copied in the same hand and bound together; the Turkish work (3) is missing the first leaf; f. 84v-98v are all excerpts from (naqala min) the same book with no attribution, Miṣbāḥ al-ẓalām.

msItem.title: Collection of works on astronomy and astronomical instruments

author.persName: Marrākushī, Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī, active 13th century
Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1423-
سبط المارديني، بدر الدين محمد بن محمد،

msItem.title: [Collection of works on astronomy and astronomical instruments]
Risālah laṭīfah fī al-ʻamal bi-al-kurah al-musammá bi-Dhāt al-kursī / Qusṭā ibn Lūqā
Risālat al-ʻamal bi-al-kurah / Abū ʻAlī al-Marrākushī
[Turkish work on astronomy in 30 chapters]
Jadwal maṭāliʻ al-burūj
Risālah fī al-astaṭurlạb / Mūsá ibn Ibrāhīm
Risālah fī al-ʻamal bi-al-rubʻ al-mujayyab / Sibṭ al-Māridīnī
Mūḍiḥ al-awqāt / Muḥammad ibn Sinān al-Muwaqqit
Fī bayān aḥkām al-kawākib al-ʻalawiyah fī al-burūj al-ithná ʻashar
Masʼalah fī maʻrifat ṣafḥat al-astaṭurlāb
Fī bayān maʻrifat ṭulūʻ al-manāzil min awwal al-layl ilá ākhirih
Fī bayān tasyīr al-darajah ilá darajah ukhrá aw kawkab ilá ukhrá
Fī bayān taḥṣīl inẓār al-kawākib min al-tathlīth wa-al-tarbīʻ
Fī maʻrifat aṭwal al-buldān wa-ʻurūḍihā
Fī bayān ʻarḍ al-ufuq al-ḥādith
Fī maʻrifat al-maṭāliʻ al-baladīyah
Fī maʻrifat irtifāʻ al-kawkab
Fāʼidah jalīlah fī maʻrifat ṭulūʻ al-qamr wa-fāʼidah ukhrá ayḍan
Hādhā jadwal fī maʻrifat kawkab

supportDesc.extent: 101 leaves : 205 x 150 (170) mm, bound to 220 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in rapid naskh in black ink; pointed.

decoDesc.decoNote: Rubrications in red with numerous geometrical drawings and tables.

binding.p: Green paper wrapper with remnants of a stamped floral image.

origin.p: Some items in the collection (1, 2, 3, 6, 7) are dated and were copied between 1106 and 1107 AH (1695-1696 CE) (f. 16v, 25v, 36v, 69r, 76v). The last work says that the collection was gathered by Yūnus ibn Aḥmad al-Dajānī (f. 101v).

history.provenance: Formerly owned by George Arthur Plimpton (bookplate inside front cover).
